name: S.C.A.T.
description:
In the year 2029, Supreme Commander Vile Malmort and his army land on
Earth, setting in motion their plans for world domination. Humanity's
last hope now resides in the hands of the Special Cybernetic Attack
Team, or S.C.A.T. for short.

Play as a male or female half-human and half-machine soldier, solo or
with a friend. Blast and fly through relentless enemies and bosses while
collecting power-ups that provide new weapons, speed boosts, and life
recoveries. Your main objective is to send these alien invaders packing.
Get ready, soldier. You're Earth's only hope.
This game is only playable in 2D.This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
